snippet: The Wildcats and the Orange are likely No. 1 seeds in the N.C.A.A. tournament, no matter what happens in their conference tournaments, Jeff Hathaway said.
lead_paragraph: The Wildcats and the Orange are likely No. 1 seeds in the N.C.A.A. tournament, no matter what happens in their conference tournaments, Jeff Hathaway said.

headline.seo: Kentucky and Syracuse Have Little to Lose, Selection Chairman Says
headline.main: Kentucky and Syracuse Have Little to Lose, Selection Chairman Says
headline.print_headline: Kentucky and Syracuse Have Little to Lose, Selection Chairman Says
